SampleSourceLoaderPtr inp

Detailed Description

This filter class adds file loading capabilities to a Sound::SoundFactory class, by associating a SampleSourceLoader with it.

The class takes an existing SoundFactory able to load streams, and associates a SampleSourceLoader with it. The combined class is able to load files directly.

virtual SoundPtr Mangle::Sound::InputFilter::loadRaw ( SampleSourcePtr  input  )  [inline, virtual]

Load a sound from a sample source. Only valid if canLoadSource is true.

This function loads a sound from a given stream as defined by SampleSource.

Parameters:
input the input source
stream true if the file should be streamed. Implementations may use this for optimizing playback of large files, but they are not required to.
Returns:
a new Sound object

Implements Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory.

virtual void Mangle::Sound::InputFilter::update (  )  [inline, virtual]

Call this every frame if needsUpdate is true.

This should be called regularly (about every frame in a normal game setting.) Implementions may use this for filling streaming buffers and similar tasks. Implementations that do not need this should set needsUpdate to false.

Reimplemented from Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory.
